Title: Provides for the surrender of the number plates of vehicles owned by a person whose license is suspended in N.Y. city
Summary: Relates to the surrender of number plates of vehicles owned by a person whose license is suspended in cities having a population of one million or more.
LawCode: Add ยง403-c, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the surrender of number plates of all motor vehicles which a person has registered where such person has a suspended or revoked license arising out of the operation of a motor vehicle within a city having a population of one million or more
